title: Marinated BBQ chicken kebabs
ingredients: ['1 (200g) tub 0% Greek yoghurt', '100g crumbled feta cheese', '1/2 teaspoon lemon zest', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon crushed dried rosemary', '500g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cut into 2.5cm pieces', '1 large red onion, cut into wedges', '1 large green pepper, cut into 3cm pieces']
